set_notification_message.text: M:Iphone, c:cursor, a:T3, A:claude, m:spotify, f:fantastical, e:obsidian, V:vivaldi-w, v:vivaldi-p, S:safari, t:ghostty, T:TB, s:slack, w:WA, W:Messages, o:todo, p:teams, l: outlook i:Freetube, n: NNW

manipulators.description: hyper + option + shift + h = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
hyper + shift + h = ctrl + shift + tab (prev tab)
hyper + option + command + j = option + shift + down (select para ahead)
hyper + shift + j = command + tab (next application)
hyper + control + j = ctrl + down (focus application)
hyper + option + command + k = option + shift + up (select line above)
hyper + shift + k = command + tab (prev application)
hyper + control + k = ctrl + up (expose all)
hyper + option + command + l = option + shift + right (select word after)
hyper + shift + l = command + tab (next tab)
hyper + command + u = shift + cmd + left
hyper + command + p = shift + cmd + right
